title: Life Is For Eating: a collection of short stories
description: Cinnamon buns elope. The god of custard pudding visits a lonely baker. A foodie becomes a delicious pastry.These any many more tales are in this darkly amusing collection of short stories about obsessions with dessert.Each story is paired with a comedic recipe about the story's main dessert. You can read about dessert and eat it too.Life is for eating.
author: A.D. Gentle
